summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated August 6, 2019. It includes count sheets, inmate rosters, and out-count forms, which are routine prison headcount and location tracking documents. The significance lies in the date, as it is the day Jeffrey Epstein was found dead in his cell at MCC New York.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as inmate register number 76318-054 on an inmate roster form dated August 6, 2019, the day he was found dead.

persons.name: Tartaglione
persons.context: Listed as inmate register number 78514-054 on the same inmate roster form as Jeffrey Epstein, dated August 6, 2019.

persons.name: B. Roricy
persons.context: Signed as the staff member supervising an out-count form on August 6, 2019.

events.title: Prison Administrative Counts
events.description: Routine inmate counts and location tracking were conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: The documents are dated August 6, 2019, the day Jeffrey Epstein died in custody.
Jeffrey Epstein is listed as inmate 76318-054 on an inmate roster for that date.
Another inmate, Tartaglione (register number 78514-054), appears on the same roster.
The forms are routine prison administrative records for tracking inmate counts and locations.
The documents originate from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
